item.description:
Well, the weather outside looks delightful, and there are no clouds afoot that might be frightful, so if it don't rain or snow, lets go, lets go, lets go...

Suggesting we meet at Millenium Park in Parking Lot C at 9:45AM for a stroll in the park kicking off at 10AM. We'll do about 45 minutes to an hour and shunt back to Panera Dedham, appetitie in tow. I'll play the role of Mr. Mandelbaum (ala Lloyd Bridges) to get us going.

Alternatively, we can meet at the canoe launch and traverse the path along the water. Let's decide on venue by first meeting up in Parking Lot C near the playground.

Harvela
item.name: Do the stroll
